text: Mary Louise Stepan (February 2, 1935 â€“ December 15, 2021) was an American competition swimmer. Stepan represented the United States at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki.Sports-Reference.com, Olympic Sports, Athletes, Marilee Stepan. Retrieved November 26, 2012. She won a bronze medal at the event. Stepan was born in Chicago, Illinois. Stepan died in Winnetka, Illinois on December 15, 2021, at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American swimmers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Chicago
title: Marilee Stepan
